update_every.title: Update frequency
update_every.description: The frequency, in seconds, at which data is collected from the MySQL server.

dsn.title: DSN
dsn.description: MySQL server Data Source Name (DSN) specifying the connection details.

my.cnf.title: my.cnf path
my.cnf.description: Specifies the path to the my.cnf file containing connection settings under the [client] section.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The timeout, in seconds, for queries executed against the MySQL server.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).
